contentrichtext.text: {{Notability|date=July 2008}}{{Refimprove|date=July 2008}} {{Infobox television | show_name = QTV | image = | caption = | format = [[Science]]<br>[[Children]]<br>[[Reality]] | camera = | picture_format = | runtime = | creator = | developer = | executive_producer = | starring = [[Barnaby Fredric]]<br>[[Chelsie Crayford]]<br>[[Paora Durie]]<br>[[Tessa Devereux]] | narrated = | opentheme = | endtheme = | country = [[New Zealand]] | network = [[TVNZ]] | first_aired = 2006 | last_aired = present<br>(on-hiatus) | num_episodes = | website = }} '''QTV''' is a [[New Zealand]] children's science-based multimedia series designed to engage young people in the world around them. The series is fronted by the "Q Team", four young people with a passion for discovery and science. The Wellington-based team is Barnaby Fredric, Chelsie Crayford, Tess Devereux, and Paora Durie. Each week one of the team throws down a new scientific challenge and kids are encouraged to post their findings online, where further opportunities for exploration and participation abound. {{DEFAULTSORT:Qtv (New Zealand Tv Series)}} [[Category:New Zealand children's television series]] [[Category:2000s New Zealand television series]] [[Category:2006 New Zealand television series debuts]] [[Category:Television New Zealand programmes]] {{Child-tv-prog-stub}} {{NewZealand-tv-stub}}
